name: Carrera F1
overview: This is a top-down racing game for one or two players. Select the racing course you wish to participate in a big race. You can either race against the computer or a friend. Try to control your car wisely using the UP control on a joystick. The game has additional options in which will enhance play slightly. Can you become one of the top racers through all 8 courses, or will you retire to the pit?
